Summary: descending verticly like meteorbut much slower like falling space debris
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and friends were watching the christmas tree light show at wiregrass mall in tampa\wesley chapel. i was doing a video clip on my digital camera. 50 seconds into the music we all saw a flalling star or some other object fall directly in our line of site. we were facing due east and that sort of lines up with the space coast some distance away. i am not sure if it was a comet or meteor. it seemed more like it was coming down near verticle and i thought it might be falling space junk. there was some color observed by my wife and fiends. was pretty exciting and we new immediately that it was from space.the object seemed to falling since it was nearly vertical and only had a slight arch . it appeared to be coming from the north while we looked east. it also had red trailing off the back we watched it till it was near the horizon.
